item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Lapho ushicilela iwebhusayithi ungahle ufune ukunikeza ukuhumusha okuhlukile. Abanye abantu abathandi abahumushi abazenzakalelayo, ngicabanga ukuthi ukuhumusha okuzenzakalelayo kuhle ngokwanele, futhi kungcono kunalutho, futhi abahumushi abazisebenzelayo baye bathuthuka kangcono ngokuthuthuka I-NLP futhi I-ML.

Izinsizakalo ezijwayelekile zokuhumusha yi-google, bing, yandex. Lokhu kunikela ngesigaba samahhala esifuna ukusisongela ukusisebenzisa kwethu siqu. Kukhona nokunye okuncane okungaziwa izinsizakalo zokuhumusha , futhi ezinye zazo zivaliwe ngesikhathi sokubhala ...

Umbhalo wokulondoloza isikhashana

Uma sifuna ukulondoloza okwesikhashana ukuhumusha, besidinga ukuhlukanisa umbhalo oceliwe ube yimicu emincane yokuthi mincane ngokwanele ukuhlinzeka ngokushaya kwezicelo ezizayo zesikhathi esizayo. I- ezohwebo ukuthi ukuhunyushwa kwemisho emincane kunomongo omncane, okwehlisa ikhwalithi yokuhumusha.

Ngabe siwuhlukanisa kanjani umbhalo ongenayo ukuze sikwazi ukwakha kabusha okwangempela kusuka kumbhalo ohunyushiwe kuliqhinga impela..noma ukukhohlisa. Sifuna ukuthola intambo exakile ngokwanele ukuthi insiza yokuhumusha iyishiye njengoba kunjalo ekuphumeni kwayo. Ngithole ukuhlukahluka kwe- umlingiswa wendima ukusebenza izikhathi eziningi

$this->misc['glue'] = ' ; ¶ ; ';
$this->misc['splitGlue'] = '/\s?;\s?¶\s?;?\s?/';

I-glue intambo isetshenziselwa ukuvumelana konke izintambo (kwehlukaniswe nesicelo sokuqala) kuya ku- eyodwa umzimba owodwa wesicelo sokuhumusha esikhuphukayo esisithumela isib. i-google. I-splitGlue esikhundleni salokho kusetshenziselwa ukwahlukanisa ukuhumusha okutholakele kwaba yizingcingo esizozenza inqolobane. Sibona lapha ukuthi ukwehlukaniswa kwezintambo akusizi nje ukulondolozwa kwesikhashana, kepha ku- ukunciphisa inani lezicelo, ngoba uma kwenzeka isicelo sethu esezansi senza imibuzo eminingi emincane, sisebenzisa imishini yethu ukuhlanganisa izicelo kuze kufike kusayizi omkhulu wokulayisha okhokhelwayo ovunyelwe insizakalo ephezulu.

Isibonisi

Ukuze usekele izinsizakalo eziningi ngokusobala Ngabhala isikhombimsebenzisi esihlala kule api

function__construct(
    Mtr &$mtr,
    Client &$gz,
    TextReq &$txtrq,
    LanguageCode &$ld);
functiontranslate($source, $target, $input);
functiongenReq(array$params);
functionpreReq(array &$input);
functiongetLangs();

Ngakho-ke insizakalo ezosebenza kufanele inikeze umsebenzi wokuhumusha, ukuthi uhumusha kanjani izicelo, futhi unikeze uhlu lwezilimi ezisekelwayo. Ngohlu lwezilimi ezisekelwayo singakha i-matrix yokuthi sazi ukuthi zingaki izinsizakalo ezisekela ngababili bolimi oluthile, lokwehlukanisa ngababili bolimi siguqula isethulo esibuyiswe yisevisi sifananeiso639-1.

Ukwakhiwa kwesibonelo sokuhumusha futhi kuvumela ukumisa izinketho zezicelo ezisetshenzisweGuzzle isibonelo seklayenti esinokuthi ngokwesibonelo sisebenzise ama-proxies ukwenza izicelo. Izinsizakalo zikhona okulondoloziwe ngemuva kokukhiqizwa okokuqala, lokhu kuyasiza ngoba ezinye izinsizakalo zidinga ukukhiqiza amathokheni okuqala, futhi asifuni ukuzivuselela njalo.

Uhlobo lweGo

Ngibhale ne- inguqulo ku-golang. Uhlobo lwe-PHP luzosetshenziswa ngokulungenisa kuphrojekthi yakho ye-PHP, kanti uhlobo lwe-go lusebenza njengensizakalo ezimele (micro). Uhlobo lwe-go lusenzo kakhulu njengoba ludinga ukubhekwa kohlobo oluqinile futhi njengoba sisekela ukubuza izintambo eziningi ngasikhathi sinye, kufanele siveze i-api esebenza ngezinhlanganisela zokufaka ezahlukahlukene, futhi ukusweleka kwe-go genics kwenza ukwenziwa kube buhlungu kakhulu, kepha kwanikela ukucubungula ngasikhathi sinye, futhi kwakushesha kakhulu ngokujwayelekile.

Okokufaka kokuhlanza

Kuhlanganiswe nokuhumusha ngiphinde ngakha insizakalo eya ku- hlanza i-html . Sigunyaza amanye amathegi we-html bese sikulahla okusele. Sisusa nezimpawu zokubhala eziyimpinda ezifana noogaxekile nezimpawu ezingaziwa ze-html, bese sihlanganisa izixhumanisi zibe amathegi wehange afanele.

Amathuluzi ahlobene

  • abahumushi

  • umhumushi ojulile

  • translate Shell

Ukuzibamba:

  • i-apertium

  • apache joshua

  • ukuhumusha kwe-argos

Iziphetho

Kulezi zinsuku ngicabanga ukuthi ngizovele ngisebenzise isisombululo esizimele, esinikezwe ngu-joshua noma u-argos, ngoba angihlosile ukuhumusha okuhle kakhulu, ngifuna ukunikeza ukuhumusha okufundekayo kwewebhusayithi, ukuze ikwazi ukuzulazula ngaphandle kokungqubuzana.

Thumela Amathegi: amathuluzi, mayelana
Ephreli 08, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Izihlahla ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu- ~ 3

Ukutshala

  • Lapho utshala iminqumo, kuyalulekwa ukuthi ubeke i- umbhede wamatshe ukuvumela amanzi ageleze amanzi, lokhu akudingeki ezindaweni ezifudumele, futhi mhlawumbe kuphikisane nokukhiqiza ngoba kuzothikameza imisebenzi izinkuni chirurgy lapho izihlahla zikhula.

  • A induku isetshenziselwa ukuphoqa isihlahla ukuthi sikhule sibheke phezulu ezigabeni zaso zokuqala, induku kufanele ibe yizindawo kuisiqondiso esiphambene kwe umoya onamandla kunawo wonke kwendawo, ukuphikisa ukwenza okungaguquguquki ukugoba inqubo esetshenziswa yimimoya isiqu esikhulu.

  • Akufanele kwenziwe ukuthenwa, futhi uhlelo malukhule ngokwemvelo yakhe ukuma ehlathini.

  • Izimpande esigabeni esincane zikhula njenge izimpande , ujulile emhlabathini futhi mfushane ezinhlangothini. Lokhu ikakhulukazi kungumphumela odalwa ukwakheka kokuqala okunikezwe izitshalo ezikhuliswe enkulisa yezitshalo. Izitshalo ezihlume endle kufanele ziqale ukukhula izimpande ezithandekayo zisuka. Izimpande zimbi ngoba ngemuva kwesigaba esincanyana, ngemuva kokuba izimpande ezithandekayo zigcine sezithathile, ziqala ukubola, zishiya isitshalo sisengozini yokushona ngaphansi komhlaba isikhunta sihlasela.

  • Izitshalo ezincane zinjalo abasengozini enkulu kwisomiso.

Izihlahla ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu- ~ 10

  • Sekuyisikhathi sokukhetha amagatsha amakhulu azokwehlukanisa isiqu ku-2 bese kutholakala oku-4.

  • Qiniseka ukuthi amagatsha akhethiwe axosha ngaphandle futhi ngalinye emakhoneni ahlukene wesikwele sesigaba.

  • Ukuhlukaniswa kokuqala kufanele kube cishe ngama-80cm-1m ukusuka emhlabathini.

  • Ukuthambekela kwabo kufanele kube ngu-30/60 °.

  • Qiniseka ukuthi amagatsha akhethiwe awahambi kahle futhi anamagatsha amancane abalekela phezulu.

Ezinye izindlela zokuthena

Le esanda kuchazwa iyindlela ejwayelekile yokuthena izihlahla zeminqumo e okungezona ezeqile emasimini. Ezinye izindlela ezinjenge- epsylon futhi isihlahla sikakhisimusi azibonisanga izinzuzo ngakho-ke azithandeki.

Okuwukuphela kokunye okuvumelekile kokuma kwe-polyconic yi- imbulungashape, yize isimo se-polyconic singashintshwa ukuze sanelise izakhiwo zesimo sembulunga ngokukhulisa idome elincanyana lamagatsha amancane aphuma ngaphakathi esiqongweni segatsha eliphakeme kakhulu.

Ngemuva kweminyaka engu- ~ 10

Lesi yisikhathi lapho izihlahla ziqala khona ukukhiqiza isivuno esihle. Ukuthena kulesi sigaba kuqukethe

Ukuncipha kombhede

  • sika amagatsha aphelelwe amandla, okuyilawa magatsha asondele kakhulu kunsisekelo yokuxhuma kwegatsha (egatsheni elikhulu), futhi amadala kunamanye amagatsha (eduze kwamathiphu). Lawo magatsha (akhiqize iminqumo eminyakeni eyedlule), ambozwe amagatsha amancane namancane aseduze namathiphu, manje anciphise ukugeleza kwempuphu futhi azoma kancane njengoba isihlahla siqondisa kabusha ubisi lapho amagatsha gaya ama-carbs amaningi sibonga ukuvezwa kokukhanya okuphezulu.

  • usike amahlumela, asondele kakhulu ekuhlukanisweni kwegatsha; Njengoba indawo lapho kwenzeka khona ukuhlukaniswa kabili kuvame ukuba nendawo evundlile, amagatsha aqhamuka emgodini wegatsha avame ukukhula ngokuma phezulu lapho efuna ukukhanya okungenakugwenywa.

  • Ungazisiki zonke, qala esisekelweni bese usika u-2 noma u-3 (yize kuya ngosayizi wamagatsha) bese ushiya konke okunye, okuzoba yingxenye ekhiqizayo yegatsha eminyakeni ezayo.

  • usike amagatsha amade kakhulu, futhi abaleke ukwakheka kombhede.

  • kepha futhi nalabo abangaphakathi kakhulu, ngoba uhlala ufuna ukwakha igatsha lokukhiqiza njengeV , ngenhloso ekuyo yonke indawo yokwandisa ukuhamba komoya nokukhanya okulula.

  • usike wonke amahlumela aqhamuka emagatsheni amakhulu bese ekhula aye phezulu noma ngaphakathi (ngasenkabeni), uqiniseke ukuthi ushiya lawo akhethiwe ukuthi athathe indawo yamagatsha amakhulu ngokwawo (okufanele abheke phezulu noma ngaphandle kancane).

  • usike amagatsha amaningi agulayo ngangokunokwenzeka (njengamagatsha athinteka yi ifindo lomnqumo ), kepha ngiyaqiniseka ukuthi ngihamba njalo okuthile . Imvamisa ukuthena akufanele kususe okungaphezulu kwe-1/3 kwetende, kepha ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu kwamukelekile ukufinyelela2/3.

Ukushintsha amagatsha amakhulu

  • ngokukhulisa izinto ezingangena eduze nendawo emaphakathi kwesihlahla esivela emagatsheni azothathelwa indawo okuyi:

    • ogulayo, obuthakathaka (uhlaza oluphansi) noma owomile (isisulu sezimpande ezibolayo)

    • kusinda kakhulu (ngendlela yokuthi igatsha elithambekele limboze amagatsha angomakhelwane)

  • Abazobambela kufanele baboshwe (ngentambo noma okulingana) negatsha elizosikwa, ngenhloso yokuqondisa igatsha elincane liqonde kwelidala.

  • Amagatsha amila kanjani amazinyane? Ithiphu yegatsha ngalinye iqhuma njalo amagugu amabili ngasikhathi (ezinhlangothini eziphambene), nge kushintshana 180° orientation at each generation. One of the branches is sterile and goes upwards, where as the fertile one tend to be pendulous. This is not an accurate definition but can help choosing which isimo ukunikeza umuthi. Igatsha ngalinye ekugcineni lizothela ngokuhluma amagatsha amasha kuzeluleko zawo. Ukuhluma kwenzeka entwasahlobo nasekwindla, okuvame ukuba yizikhathi ezinomswakama ophakeme, futhi kuvame ukuhambisana nezikhathi zokuthena, okwenza ukukhetha kwesikhathi sokuthena nakho kubalulekile.

    • Ngasiphi isikhathi sonyaka isihlahla kufanele sithenwe? Izihlahla ze-olive ziyancipha ebusika nasehlobo (ngenxa yesomiso), okwenza lezi kube yizikhathi ezifanele zokuthena. Kodwa-ke emagatsheni athena izithelo athela izithelo akulungile noma ngabe akulimazi isihlahla uqobo. Njengoba izitshalo ziphula ukulala ngemuva kuka ~ 11 ° Isikhathi esifanele sokuthena (noma okungenani ukusika okunqume kakhulu) kusekupheleni kobusika (njengokuthi amanxeba avulekile angathintwa yiqhwa elibi), ekuqaleni kwentwasahlobo (ngaphambi kokuba umuthi uqale khetha ukuthi zingaki izinsizakusebenza ozozibekela i-fructification).

Ukuphakama

  • ukusika iziqongo eziphakeme kakhulu (shiya njalo onqenqemeni)

    • Ukuphakama okuphezulu kwesihlahla kuncike ebude besitebhisi osisebenzisela ukuthena (uma usebenzisa iladi), noma ubude bamathuluzi akho we-telescopic (uma ungasebenzisi iladi.)

Isikhunta

  • bamba izinkuni ezibolile ezibangelwa isikhunta sihlasela esisekelweni noma emagatsheni ane-chainsaw noma i-hatchet.

Ungakusika kanjani ukusika

Uma uthena, noma yikuphi ukukhetha kubila ekwenzeni ukusikeka, indlela owenza ngayo kuthinte umuthi, futhi njengoba ungalinganisa ukusikeka kwamakhulu esihlahleni ngasinye, konke kuyahlangana. Le mithetho isebenza kunoma yisiphi isihlahla ngokujwayelekile, hhayi izihlahla zeminqumo kuphela.

  • Ukusikeka okukhulu, lapho le mithetho ithwala isisindo esikhulu, njengomthetho wesithupha:

    • ngaphansi kwe1cm azibalulekile

    • Ngaphezu kwe2cm izinto ziqala ukuba nendaba

    • Khumbula ukuthi indawo ingumsebenzi we-quadratic, okusho ukuthi imiphumela yokwanda kokwehluka endaweni futhi ikhule njengamandla amabili.

  • Kusala malini? Ukushiya imiphumela eningi kwifayela le- isiphunzi. izimbobo kumagxolo (izimbobo zimbi, zishiya ukugeleza kwangaphakathi kobisi kuvezwe kakhulu kokungaphandle, futhi kuvumela amanzi ukuma , ukwakha indawo ekahle yesikhunta esiphikisayo esiphikisayo).

    • Njengoba ukusikeka okuningi kuzobandakanya ukusika amaswidi, aneminyaka yobudala eyi-1-3 (noma ngaphezulu ngokuvamile iminyaka engaphansi noma elingana nobuningi bokuthena), kulula ukuhlukanisa omncane amagxolo amahlumela, avela amadala elinye lamagatsha amakhulu, ukusika kufanele kwenziwe kulo mngcele, ukuze kuthi wonke amagxolo amancane esihlumela asuswe, futhi kungabikho khonkolo elidala elikhishwayo.

    • Uma amagatsha amadala, nomehluko wobudala bamagxolo akulula ukuwubona (emngceleni bobabili babukeka begugile), omunye umkhondo osiza ukusikwa kungumumo wegatsha ozonqunywa. Imvamisa umngcele ophakathi kwamagatsha awuyona i-angle eqinile, kunalokho ufana nejika elihle. Uma kubhekwa isigaba esime mpo, ukusika kuzokwenziwa lapho imigqa emibili efanayo yegatsha izowela ngaphakathi igxolo.

    • Ukuqondiswa kokusika ngokujwayelekile kufanele kube i-orthogonalekuqondeni lapho igatsha elizosikwa likhula khona. Ukwenza ukusikeka ngale ndlela kuqinisekisa ukuthi bancane ngangokunokwenzeka ngoba (uma kubhekwa isigaba esivundlile) ukusika kusondele kumbuthano futhi kuqhubeke kusuka kusiyingi, njengoba kunikezwe ububanzi besiyingi, futhi kucatshangwa ukuthi ubukhulu obuncane be-ellipse ngokufana nombuthano, indawo ye-ellipse izohlala ingaphezulu noma ilingana nendawo yombuthano. Sekukonke, kusho ukuthi ukusikeka okuncane kuholela emanxebeni amancane, okuholela ekuphulukisweni ngokushesha nasekungeneni kwezifo.

      • Kukhona okuhlukile nokho, lapho ukusikeka kuzogcina kubheke phezulu, kungcono ukubenza bathambe kancane; lokhu kuvumela imvula ukuba yehle ngokungathi ibiyovela ophahleni, esikhundleni sokumba izimbobo ngokungenakuphikiswa enxebeni elishiywe ukusika.

    • Amagatsha amancane anemicu eminingi, amadala anemisipha eminingi. Kusho ukuthini lokhu ukuthi okusele okuvela emagatsheni amancane kuzokwenza cishe oma. Njengoba imicu igcwele kakhulu, isengozini enkulu yomoya nelanga uma kuqhathaniswa namagatsha amadala amakhulu. Futhi amagxolo akhudlwana amagatsha amadala avimbela umswakama ekuphunyukeni.

  • Hlanganisa i-engela elilodwa (le-4) ngasikhathi, uqale phezulu bese wehlela ngasisekelo.

    • Ngaphandle kokuthi uhlela ukusika amagatsha aphakeme akhule abheke phansi kakhulu, lapho-ke uqala kulawo, bese eqhubeka njengokujwayelekile, phezulu kuye ezansi (yize ukusikeka okungaxakeki kangako ngoba usanda kusika kakhulu phansi.)

Umhlabathi, Umanyolo, amanzi nezithelo

  • Izihlahla zomnqumo zidinga initrogen eningi, ngoba kufanele zishintshe amahlamvu azo njalo. (Ukuhlukaniswa okuningiliziwe kwawo wonke amaminerali bheka leli phepha)

  • Njengasemasimini amaningi ufuna ukuxubana nomanyolo oncibilikayo nophilayo

  • Amanzi abalulekile entwasahlobo, ngaphambi nangesikhathi sokuqhakaza kwezimbali, ukusiza ukubumbana; ukungakunaki ukwenza kanjalo entwasahlobo eyomile, kuzodala ukuthi izithelo eziningi ezincane ziwe ngaphambi kokufika ehlobo.

  • Amanzi nawo abalulekile ngesikhathi sasehlobo, hhayi ngekhwalithi yezithelo, kepha kusabalulekile esitshalweni nesikhathi sokuvuna. Njengoba indlela yemishini yokuvuna iminqumo kungukuzamazama komuthi, isihlahla esibuthakathaka esingaphansi kwengcindezi enjalo sizokhulula futhi amahlamvu aso amaningi kakhulu, ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuthi uqiniseke ukuthi izihlahla zinombhede oqinile ngaphambi kokuvuna. Ukunisela kwehlobo nakho kwenza izithelo zikhule zizungeze (futhi zikhudlwana, yize usayizi weminqumo uncike ezinhlotsheni ezilinyiwe)

  • Abanye abantu bathi ukuchelela izihlahla zomnqumo ehlobo kuholela ekukhiqizweni okuphezulu kweminqumo, kepha hhayi isivuno esiphezulu samafutha omnqumo futhi kwenza ukukhishwa kukawoyela kube nzima (njengoba imishini kufanele ihlukanise amanzi amaningi nakoyela). Ngokwami ​​ukubona lokhu akulona iqiniso.

    • Ama-oliva aqhamuka ezihlahleni eziniselwa lonke ihlobo okokuqala anempilo. Iminqumo enempilo inesivuno esikhulu, isikhumba sinamathuba amancane okugqashuka futhi sigcine izinto eziningi ngaphakathi kwempuphu. Kokubili imbewu ne-pulp zikhulu, futhi njengoba iminqumo akuwona amagilebhisi[1] , impela bazoba namafutha amaningi.

      [1] Izithelo ezifana namajikijolo ziyakwazi ukugcina okuqukethwe kwamanzi ngaphandle kokukhulisa isithelo uqobo, njenge izikhwama. Lokhu akulona iqiniso kuma-drupes.

  • Izimpande zidinga umoya-mpilo, inhlabathi enezimbobo enhle, futhi ivumela izimpande ukuthi zikhule ngaphandle kokubeka engcupheni ukuphelelwa umoya. Amatshe avuthayo ahlanganiswe nenhlabathi angasiza ekugcineni inhlabathi ivulekile, ngaphandle kokusebenzisa ukulima.

  • I-Trichoderma ne-mycorrhizae zisiza ekulweni nokubola kwezinkuni, okufanele kusatshalaliswe enhlabathini eduze ngangokunokwenzeka nezimpande. Ngaphandle kwalezi zindlela zokwelashwa ezingenayo ukuphilisa izakhiwo (ziyindlela yokuzivikela), zingabhekwa njengezokwelapha endabeni yeminqumo ngenxa yesimo sazo esingapheli, amandla azo aphakathi nendawo namandla awo emvelo khipha inyumbazane isikhunta se-phytophagous. Ngamanye amagama, njengoba izihlahla zomnqumo "ziziphilisa", i-trichoderma ne-mycorrhizae kungathathwa njengokuphulukisa izithuthukisi.

  • Ukulima, ukulima noma utshani? Kuya ngohlobo lomhlabathi nesimo sezulu esimaphakathi, noma kunjalo:

    • ngoba izimpande zomuthi womnqumo azivame ukukhula zijule ngaphezu kwemitha eli-1, kulinywa ukutshalwa. Izihlahla zeminqumo zivame ukukhula futhi kunamadwalainhlabathi, lapho ngisho nokulima kungenzeka, futhi ukusebenza kwenhlabathi kuncishiselwa ekugundweni. Ukulima nokulima kusebenza kangcono uma usebenzisa ama-herbicides ukulawula ukhula, kanti ngaphandle kokugunda ukhula kusiza ekulondolozeni imvelo yamagciwane enhlabathini. Lapho ukhetha ukugunda, ukulawula uhlobo lwamakhambi asele kungaba lusizo, njengesibonelo ukukhetha utshani obumelana nesomiso. Inzuzo enkulu yokulima / yokulima i-oxygenation ejulile, ngakolunye uhlangothi utshani busiza ekuqedeni ukuguguleka kwenhlabathi, ukubola kwezakhamzimba zenhlabathi, isomiso (ngokugcinwa kwamanzi okuphezulu). Kuyinsakavukela ukumboza inhlabathi ngo-80% ngokwephula, ezimweni lapho kufakwa kuphela ukulima ngaphezulu.

Isiphetho

Izihlahla zomnqumo ziyizitshalo ezinamandla kakhulu, kodwa zinjalo abafuna ukukhanya . Kukonke kulula ukuthi kutshalwe iminqumo lapho kunelanga eliningi khona namanzi anele. Izitshalo zinezindlela zemvelo zokunqanda izifo, futhi zidinga ukunakekelwa ngokumelene nezifo ezinkulu ezi-3 kuphela ( amabala, ukubola futhi ukundiza ), ngenkathi konke okunye kungabhekwa njengokuncane. Kepha ayizithandi izimo zezulu ezinzima, ayibekezeleli amazinga okushisa angaphansi kuka-0 ° nangaphezulu kuka-30 °, izimo zezulu ezimanzi kakhulu nezimo ezomile kakhulu. Yize izihlahla zomnqumo ezikhulayo zingenzeka ezindaweni ezahlukahlukene, ziyasebenza kuphela kwezomnotho ezifundeni ezingaphansi komhlaba.

iqiniso elimnandi

Kwakucatshangwa ukuthi kuyakhula okusanhlamvu phakathi kwezihlahla zomnqumo kwakukubi ngoba ukukhanya okukhombisa izakhiwo zezindlebe kungacindezela izihlahla zomnqumo ngakho-ke imidumba babekhethwa. Imidumba empeleni ikhiqiza okuningi i-nitrogen , iziphi izihlahla zeminqumo ezikulangazelelayo (ngokwesilinganiso ngaphezu kwezinye izitshalo).

Thumela Amathegi: i-agri, Imihlahlandlela
Julayi 25, 2021

item.turbo:content:
Ngaphansi kweminyaka emithathu izihlahla

Akufanele kwenziwe noma yikuphi ukuthenwa, futhi vumela uhlelo lukhule lube sesimweni sakhe semvelo sehlathi. Izimpande ezisesigabeni esincane zikhula njengezimpande, zijule emhlabathini futhi zifushane ezinhlangothini. Lokhu ikakhulukazi kungumphumela odalwa ukwakheka kokuqala okunikezwe izitshalo ezikhuliswe enkulisa yezitshalo. Izitshalo ezihlume endle kufanele ziqale ukukhula izimpande ezithandekayo zisuka. Izimpande zimbi ngoba ngemuva kwesigaba esincanyana, ngemuva kokuba izimpande ezithandekayo ekugcineni zithathe izintambo, ziqala ukubola, zishiya isitshalo sisengozini yokushona ngaphansi komhlaba isikhunta sihlasela . Izitshalo ezincane zisengozini enkulu yesomiso.

Ngaphansi kweminyaka eyi-10 yezihlahla

Sekuyisikhathi sokukhetha amagatsha amakhulu azokwehlukanisa isiqu ku-2 bese kutholakala oku-4.

  • kusuka eminyakeni emi-3 kuye kwengu-10

  • ngaphezulu kweminyaka eyi-10

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Ngokwanda kokuhlolwa kwezimali ze-crypto izintengo ze-GPU zikhuphukele ku-2-4x zazo I-MSRP . Abanye basola i-covid kanye nokukhiya okuphoqe abantu emakhaya ukwanda kwesidingo semishini yasekhaya; noma kunjalo i- cishe 1:1 correlation between historical prices of gpus and cryptos makes covid almost irrelevant.

Kuthiwani ngokufunda komshini?

Uma kuqhathaniswa, ukufunda ngomshini (noma ikakhulukazi, ukufunda okujulile) kugcwalisa kuphela uhla lwamanani aphezulu kakhulu ngoba ludinga FP ukucacisa, okuyisidingo se-niche, lapho njenge-crypto I-GPU pow izama ukusebenzisa i- okuphelele Imiyalo ye-GPU isethiwe, ngakho-ke uhla lwemikhiqizo ephelele yemakethe ye-GPU luthandeka kwezimayini.

Singalindela ukuthi amanani we-GPU abuyele ku-MSRP?

Cha. Imakethe ye-GPU idliwe yimayini ye-crypto futhi ayisoze yalulama.

  • Ama-GPU akhona i-stackableokusho ukuthi umvukuzi wakho ojwayelekile uthenga okungenani ama-4 GPU lapho-ke njengoba umthengi wakho ojwayelekile edinga i-1 GPU kuphela ezikhathini eziningi

  • Uma ama-cryptocurrensets amakhulu eguqukela ku- POS (njenge I-ETH ), ezinye izimali ze-crypto zizothatha amandla we-hashing, ukulungiswa kwentengo ebukhali kakhulu kufanele kwenzeke ukudala ukuthengiswa okungazelelwe kwe-GPU ngabavukuzi.

  • Abavukuzi bacisha futhi basebenzise imishini yezimayini ngokuya ngesilinganiso somvuzo ophakathi kwezindleko zikagesi nezintengo ze-cryptocurrency, ngeke bathengise i-Hardware ekuqaleni.

Kwenzenjani?

Ama-GPU kuphela ngesikhathi sokubhala ngamanani afanelekile yilawa ahlanganisiwe, nama-laptops athumela ngama-GPU (kufayela le- iselula izinhlobo). Uma abakhiqizi befuna ukuvula kabusha imakethe ye-GPU kubasebenzisi abaphakathi kufanele banikeze izixazululo ezihlanganisiwe ukuncintisana kakhulu ngokumelene nabazinikele. Noma dizayina uhlobo oluhlukile lwe-GPU oluphakathi nendawo phakathi kokuzinikela nokuhlanganisiwe; Kanjani? ngokucabanga ngama-CPU ahlanganiswe ngokuqinile nama-GPU asengama-modular (ngakho-ke angashintsheka, kepha angaguquguquki!).

Thumela Amathegi: i-crypto, ubuchwepheshe
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Ngenkathi ngiqala ukuhlala kulokho ukusetshenziswa kwe-linux okusetshenziselwa amaseva wami akude ngangidinga indlela yokufaka ngokushesha amasistimu wefayela lezimpande kusokhaya osokhaya, ngakho ngabhala [paroodise].

Ukuze ukwazi ukukhanyisa idivaysi yebhulokhi eboshiwe oyidingayo yehlisa . Ungehla kuphela uma uyeka ukuyisebenzisa. Ukuyeka ukuyisebenzisa udinga ukuqala kabusha izinsiza zakho endaweni, kusuka kolunye uhlelo lwefayela lempande. Lokhu kufana nalokho i- initramfsuma ivula i-OS esekwe ku-linux, i-kernel isebenzisa isithombe se-boot esisetha uhlelo lwefayela kusuka lapho kuyiqiniso init service yethulwa.

Ukufeza lokhu ku isivele igijima system kufanele siqaphele ukuthi siziqala kanjani kabusha izinqubo zethu. Asikwazi ukubulala i-ssh ngaphandle kokuthi siqiniseke ukuthi iskripthi sethu sizosebenza size siphumelele.

Yonke inqubo ilula kakhulu kuma-distros angenasisekelo, ngoba izingwegwe zesistimu zingene ngokujulile ku-linux kernel, ukuhlangana nezinqubo zayo ngokunganaki kungadala ukwethuka kwe-kernel ... empeleni ekusabalalisweni kwakamuva yilokho okuvame ukwenzeka :)

Ngenkathi ngibhala le nsiza mini kubonakala ngathi angizazi izindlela ezizinzile zokuveza izinqubo ezadlula isikhathi sokuqala ssh, Kufanele ibhalwe kabusha ngezindlela ezingaguquguquki.

Yonke inqubo iqukethe

  • ukukopisha amafayela amancane adingekayo ukuqala kabusha uhlelo lwefayela kwimemori

  • ukuhambisa (noma ukubuyisela kabusha) amaphuzu we-kernel mount (/dev, /proc, /sys)

  • ukubulala izinsizakalo zangaphambilini ezazivezwa yisihlahla senqubo esimile

  • ukwenza kabusha uhlelo kusistimu entsha yefayela evunyelwe,systemctl daemon-reexec

Uma konke kuqeda ngempumelelo kungenzeka kuleli phuzu kuveze insizakalo entsha ye-ssh bese ungena ngemvume kuseshini lapho amaphoyinti okuqala akhona angalungiswa.

Thumela Amathegi: amathuluzi, ukusingathwa, mayelana
Ephreli 08, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Umzamo wokwenza uhlu lwamaphoyinti ezinhlamvu ukuze ufunde ukudlala umdlalo, noma ufunde ukubuka umdlalo.

Ukufunda ukubuka umdlalo wehlukile ngoba akubalulekile ukuba muhle entweni ethile ukuze ukwazi ukuqonda okwenzekayo; noma amakhono wokukhanda angahlala ethokoziswa (futhi yilokho okwenza i-hype ), okuvame ukuheha abalandeli yi- izinqubo zokucabanga ngemuva kwezinqumo zemidlalo.

Uhlu lokufunda ukuthi ungadlala kanjani

Amaphuzu ebhulethi kufanele agxile ekuhambeni komdlalo, ukuthi ungakuthola kanjani u-Y ngokwenza x. Ukugeleza kuyinto ebaluleke kunazo zonke okufanele uyiqonde ngomdlalo, imishini nolwazi kuyazungeza, kungachazwa njengejubane elibheke ekugcineni kwamagoli wokugcina ukulandelana okuvamile kokufakwayo.

Ngisebenzise igama ijubane ukusho ukuthi ukugeleza komdlalo kubukeka kufana nesigqi. Ukuqonda ukuthi kwenzeka kanjani ukufana komdlalo wevidiyo kufana nokufunda ishidi lomculo, kukhona amahla-ndenyuka, izikhathi ezisheshayo, izikhathi ezihamba kancane, i-crescendo kanye nedumela elibi ukuthula ngaphambi kwesiphepho.

Uhlu lokufunda ukuthi ungabuka kanjani

Amaphuzu ezinhlamvu kufanele agxile ezicini ezithile zomdlalo, amanye aqondiswe kohlobo oluthile, amanye aqondiswe kumdlalo. Isibonelo, ukwazisa ukungqubuzana kwe-DOTA, okubalulekile akulona iqembu elizilwayo ngokwalo, kepha i- isikhundla labadlali ngaphambi kokuthi iqembu lilwe. Imininingwane enjalo ingaziswa kakhulu futhi ikwenze uthande iqembu ukwedlula elinye, ngoba libonisa ukuzilungiselela nokuhlanganisa umdlali ngamunye adlula kukho. Umphumela wokulwa kweqembu uvame ukunqunywa isikhundla somdlali ngamunye ngaphambi kwawo.

Esitelekeni sokuphikisana ukusebenzisana nokwenza ama-setups yilokho okungabongwa, kakhulu-ke ama-frags athanda ukuphindaphinda ekusebenzeni kwabo futhi alindelwe ezingeni elithile lekhono. Izimo ze-1vX nazo zingancomeka impela ngoba ziqhamuka kumasu weqembu lapho i-2 + vX ithanda ukuba yisisekelo nje salabo, futhi ivumele isidlali sibonise ikhono laso, nezinga lokucabanga okusheshayo, futhi lezi zimo zivame ukuba ezokuqala kakhulu ngokwesikhundla sezikhundla ebalazweni.

Thumela Amathegi: izibani ezikhanyayo
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Lolu uhlu lwezinhlelo zokusebenza ezabelana ngomqondo ofanayo ojwayelekile, wokufaka okuthunyelwe komsebenzisi, nokuxhumana komphakathi.

Imifino yomphakathi

Kube khona ubufakazi obuncane bemibono mayelana nenethiwekhi yokuxhumana nabantu egxile ekukhuleni nasekushintshaneni ngemifino. Kepha akukho okubi okuvelile. Kunengqondo kuphela ezingeni le-amateur, ngasikhathi sinye ingasuka kuphela ezindaweni ezinabantu abaningi abahlaza okotshani, njengokuthi inethiwekhi ingavela; Abalimi nabo badinga ukusungula iwebhu ethembekile, uma kungenjalo akukho okwenziwayo okungenzeka.

Izindawo zokubona udoti

Linganisela ukuthi indawo ethile igcwele kangakanani udoti. Umsebenzisi angathumela izithombe ezimakiwe ze-geo ezibekwe zigcwele udoti, zinikeze isilinganiso sezinkanyezi ezi-3 mayelana nokuthi kubi kangakanani. Lokhu kungasiza omasipala ukulandelela isimo semvelo sezindawo zabo, kepha kushoda ngezikhuthazo.

Amabala emigodi

Kuyafana nezindawo zokubona udoti, kepha izimbobo zomgwaqo. Lokhu kungathuthukiswa ngokusebenzisa izinzwa ze-Smartphones, ukukhomba ukukhomba ekuhambeni okujwayelekile okungazelelwelokho akufanele kwenzeke lapho usendleleni.

ukuminyana

Inani labantu, njengoba kubonakala ngeso lomuntu. Ilusizo uma ufuna ukulandelela ukuthi izikhala eziminyene njengamabhishi noma amapaki zinjani, ukuze ukwazi ukukhetha ukuya ezindaweni ezingaminyene kakhulu.

umbono

I-pseudo critical / satirical webhusayithi / i-database / isichazamazwi izinto zazichazwa ngezindlela ezahlukahlukene, njengoba zazizobonwa ubuntu / umlingiswa othile ohlukile.

Thumela Amathegi: izibani ezikhanyayo, izinhlelo zokusebenza
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Kunenkinga eyisisekelo yezimakethe: zikhawulelwe yi-psyche yomuntu. Kusho ukuthini? Ngokuyinhloko ukuthi ikhono lentengo lempahla ethile, liboshwe yikhono elihlangene lokuqonda imiphumela yesikhathi eside. Inkinga ukuthi ngoba siyizilwane, ezikhathini eziningi sizwa ingcindezi yezinto kuphela duzane nathi kokubili esikhaleni nesikhathi. Uma sithatha lokhu njengokuyiqiniso ngaso sonke isikhathi singabhala izibonelo ezisobala kakhulu lapho le nkambiso iletha ukwehluleka:

Ukusatshalaliswa kwengcebo

Kuyaqondakala ukuthi izinto zifana kanjani [ ukunciphisa okulinganiselwe ] ingahle ibukeke njengesixazululo esisebenzayo ngezikhathi zobunzima, kepha icatshangelwe isikhathi eside kunesikhathi sesikhathi sempilo yomuntu, izinto zingabukeka zehlukile, lapho izinkukhu zifike ekhaya zizohlala , ukwehla kwamandla emali, futhi izingxenye ezibuthakathaka zomphakathi zihamba phambili kakhulu. Inkinga ukuthi lapho umphumela uzwakala ( kungani le nto iphindwe kabili ngentengo? ), i-catalyst (aka enkulu yemjovo yemali) isidlulise izindaba, nabantu, bacwila ezindabeni zabo zansuku zonke (Angikwazi ukufika sekwephuzile emsebenzini noma ngizoxoshwa, angikwazi ukuxoshwa, ikakhulukazi manje, ukuthi izikweletu nezintela sekungavunyelwe kakhulu ), ayiphenduli njengoba kufanele ; Izimbangela nemiphumela ihlukanisiwe ( yisiphi isikhathi seminyaka esidale le nkinga? 1980? Ngo-1990? 2000? ), ukukhomba inkinga iba yinkinga yokuxhumanisa enganqobeki, njengoba okuseduze kakhulu izindaba eziseduze nesikhathi sesikhala somphakathi zihamba phambili ( sidinga ukulungisa ukungasebenzi manje, umnotho ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ...).

Ukushoda kwezinsizakusebenza

Lapho ngithenga ifosholo, nginenani engqondweni, lokho kwenziwa ngezingxenye ezibhala ifosholo. Isibambo nethiphu. Amanani ajwayele ukufaka izindleko zokukhipha Kusetshenziswe ezindlekweni zezinto zokusetshenziswa, khona-ke siyathola izindleko zokwakha, izindleko zokugcina, izindleko zokuhamba, izindleko zesevisi . Sika amanani entengo lapha, (singayinaki intela). Akuvamile izindleko zokulahla, izindleko zokungcola ... intengo in.

Imiphumela yomphakathi

Ngabe okuthile kuguqula kanjani umphakathi? Kukhona imikhiqizo efana ama-smartphones okushintsha unomphela ukwakheka komphakathi nezizukulwane ezizayo, kepha ukufaka izindleko ezinjalo hhayi lutho . Onke amathuluzi esiwenzayo ashintsha indlela yethu yokuphila, futhi ngokuyisisekelo indlela ethuthukayo eyithathayo ekufuneni kwayo ukwenza ngcono impilo yethu[1].

Isiphetho

Kunomkhuba ovamile lapha, izinto okunzima ukuzibala zishiywa zingenaziqinisekiso. Lokhu kuphambana nesisho okuthile kungcono kungelutho . Ukushiya izinto zingafakwanga kucishe kufane nokuphika ukuthi zikhona, lapho silandela le patheni isikhathi eside, sigcina sikhohlwe, kuze kube inkinga inkulu kakhulu ukuthi singayinaki ( irowu ekhaya lethu yakha isimo esinezintaba!). Ukubeka amanani entengo, ngisho ngokungalungile kungcono kunokulayishwa kabusha, ngoba sidinga ukukhunjuzwa njalo ukuthi izinkinga zikhona.

[1] noma umane uwagcwalise, ukuze ubalekele ukungabi bikho okukhona njalo kokuphila komuntu

Thumela Amathegi: izibani ezikhanyayo
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Le yi-javascript engiyibhalile yokuthi ukuqala kuwebhusayithi, enamacwecwe empunga, ugcina nge-gradient ngokususelwa kumbala wokugqamisa. Kuhlanganiswe nethuluzi lokukhetha umbala, iwebhusayithi ingakunikeza ekuphakameni umsebenzisi ngokwezifiso theming.

//function to return the color in hex value
        $.cssHooks.bgColor = {
                get: function(elem) {
                        if (elem.currentStyle)
                                var bg = elem.currentStyle["backgroundColor"];
                        elseif (window.getComputedStyle)
                                var bg = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(elem,
                                        null).getPropertyValue("background-color");
                        if (bg.search("rgb") == -1)
                                return bg;
                        else {
                                bg = bg.match(/^rgb\((\d+),\s*(\d+),\s*(\d+)\)$/);
                                functionhex(x) {
                                        return ("0" + parseInt(x).toString(16)).slice(-2);
                                }
                                returnhex(bg[1]) + hex(bg[2]) + hex(bg[3]);
                        }
                }
        }

        //function to make colors brighter or darkerfunctionshadeColor(color, porcent) {

                var R = parseInt(color.substring(1,3),16)
                var G = parseInt(color.substring(3,5),16)
                var B = parseInt(color.substring(5,7),16);

                R = parseInt(R * (100 + porcent) / 100);
                G = parseInt(G * (100 + porcent) / 100);
                B = parseInt(B * (100 + porcent) / 100);

                R = (R<255)?R:255;
                G = (G<255)?G:255;
                B = (B<255)?B:255;

                varRR = ((R.toString(16).length==1)?"0"+R.toString(16):R.toString(16));
                varGG = ((G.toString(16).length==1)?"0"+G.toString(16):G.toString(16));
                varBB = ((B.toString(16).length==1)?"0"+B.toString(16):B.toString(16));

                return"#"+RR+GG+BB;
        }

        function(){
                        $this = $(this) ;
                        bc = $($this).parent().css('bgColor');
                        var newc = shadeColor('#'+bc, 40);
                        $('.rt').css('opacity', '0.4');
                        $($this).parent().animate({backgroundColor: '\''+newc+'\''}, 1500).css({'opacity': '1', 'cursor' : 'hand'});
                }
                ,
                function(){
                        $(this).parent().animate({backgroundColor: '\'#'+bc+'\''}, 1500);
                        $(this).css({
                                opacity: 0.8
                        });
                        $('.rt').not($this).css('opacity', '0.7');?

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Kukhona isisho esithi imibono emihle inemilenze yayo. Angicabangi ukuthi iqiniso lelo. Impumelelo yombono incike entweni esondelene kakhulu nemakethe. Nganoma yisiphi isikhathi kunabantu abazimisele ukuthenga emibonweni emisha, futhi njenganoma imuphi imakethe, kunesidingo nokuhlinzekwa. Lapho isidingo sincane, umqondo udinga ukufanele Okuningi kunabanye.

Ngamanye amagama, wonke umqondo unemilenze, kepha eminye imilenze imifushane kuneminye. Yini okudingwa yimishini? Izinto ezifanayo eziqhuba ezinye izimakethe. Ipolitiki, iminyaka, izinkathi zonyaka ...

Ingabe wonke umqondo kufanele uwuphishekele? Kunzima ukukala uma umbono ubalulekile noma cha, kepha abanye abantu bangcono ekuboneni imibono emihle, abanye bangcono ukufaka isicelo imibono emihle. Lokhu kusho ukuthi i uqobo imakethe yemibono, esazobekwa emzimbeni, ingaba nengqondo, ngoba yilokho izimakethe okuhle kukho, ukuthola malini okuthile kuwufanele.

Faka i-crypto: Imibono yamathokheni

Ukwenza ithokheni umqondo kusho ukuthi, onakho uhlobo oluthile lwelungeloemcabangweni uqobo. Lokhu kuqala ukubukeka kakhulu amalungelo obunikazi ku-blockchain . Kepha amalungelo obunikazi akuyona into engiyithandayo, nokho ukutholwa kwentengo okukhuthazayo kwemibono okusazosetshenziswa nakanjani (umbono!) Engicabanga ukuthi kufanele ukuwusebenzisa.

Ungakugwema kanjani ukunyathelwa kwelungelo lobunikazi ? Ukunyathelwa kwelungelo lobunikazi kungumphumela we okuxekethile imithetho esetshenziswa kumalungelo obunikazi, ithemba ukuthi njengoba i-crypto space ethos, kufanele landela umthetho olandelwayo , incazelo yamalungelo obunikazi izolandela umbuso oqinile kakhulu owehlisa izindawo ezimpunga.

Ukwenza umbono futhi kusho ukwehlukanisa umqondo ube yizinto eziningi amasheya ubathengise emakethe. Kwenzekani lapho umbono ubanjwe amaqembu amaningi? Amathuba okunyathelwa kwelungelo lobunikazi ayehla ngoba wonke umnikazi wamasheya kuzodingeka ukuthi kungathembeki futhi kuzimisele ukulandela ukuthotshwa kwamalungelo obunikazi, izindleko zokuxhumanisa zilungile uma kuqhathaniswa nokunyathelwa kwamalungelo obunikazi!

Ukugijima kwe-mill crypto economics

Ngingacabanga yonke imibono, njengesivumelwano esihlakaniphile esakha ithokheni. Wonke umuntu ophethe amathokheni unevoti lokwabelana lokuqalisa i- isivuno isicelo ngokumelene nenye inkontileka ehlakaniphile okuthiwa isebenzisa impahla yengqondo ebanjwe "ithokheni yombono". Izicelo ezinjalo zizosulwa ngabantu besithathu, njengama-kleros. Lesi yisikhuthazo, okungukuthi, amalungelo okuvota okuqinisa ukuhoxa, nokwengeza isivuno esinjalo uma samukelwa umuntu wesithathu.

Thumela Amathegi: izibani ezikhanyayo
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
IBash/ zshukubhala kweShell kwenza umsebenzi wenziwe. Kubuye kubi impela. Mhlawumbe kuhloswe. Okuncane ofuna ukukubuka kuzoba kufushane imibhalo ezoba yikho. Angiyena umlandeli wokusebenzisa i-bash / zsh njengegobolondo elisebenzisanayo, inani lama-plugins adingekayo ukwenza okuhlangenwe nakho okuhle liyasabeka, futhi yonke i-plugin eyengeziwe iyisihibe sokungenzeka kwe-shell slow downs. Ungalokothi-unciphise inani lomsebenzi owenziwe yi-psprint nge zinit nabangane kuyamangalisa kakhulu (futhi futhi uhlobo lokukhetha okuwukuphela komphathi we-plugin uma ufuna ukusebenzisa i-zsh njengegobolondo elixhumanayo). Kodwa-ke akulixazululi iqiniso lokuthi wonke lawo ma-plugins alayishiwe angama- okungabelwanga ngakho inkumbulo phakathi (mhlawumbe) kwezinqubo eziningi zeShell.

Igobolondo lezinhlanziyigobolondo lami engilithandayo ngesikhathi sokubhala. Inani lama-plugins afakiwe lincane kakhulu, ngoba lenza izinto eziningi ongazifuna kuShell ngaphandle kwebhokisi . Iskripthi sihamba kancane kune-zsh kepha akekho onendaba nesivinini sokubhala ngakho-ke kulungile. I-syntax yinhle ngefa le-ML (njengoJulia) ngezitatimende zokuphela, esikhundleni sezinsimbi ezisontekile. Ukubhala imibhalo kusetshenziswa kakhulu kune-bash / zsh kepha futhi kufundeka kakhulu. Izinto ezinjengokufaka esikhundleni senqubo, ukuhlanganiswa kwentambo kanye namapayipi kugcina isenzo esithe xaxa. Ine global okuguqukayo, okwabiwe kuzo zonke izinqubo ezisebenzayo, kanye indawo yonke okuguqukayo, okwabiwe ngezikhathi zonke, okwenza izinto zibe lula ngaphandle kokubhala konke phansi nokuthola imibhalo ekhohlwayo.

Elvish ingabe igobolondo elinokusekelwa kwezinto eziningi, njenge-daemon noma imodi yewebhu evumela ukuthi ithumele imiyalo kude ...? Ngicabanga ukuthi kuningi kakhulu futhi ngiqala ukuyibiza ngokuqumba. I-IMHO igobolondo kufanele ilwele ukuba lula, futhi ibe nokuqukethwe. Ngicabanga ukuthi amagobolondo kufanele aklanyelwe ukuphatha izimo lapho izinqubo ziveza inani elivelele lezikhathi, eziziphatha ngokungaguquki kusukela ekuqaleni kuze kube sekugcineni futhi eziqukethe ngokwazo ukuze zikwazi ukusingatha izingozi ngomusa. Ngakho-ke ngaphandle kwazo zonke ezinye izici (njengedatha ehlelekile) ... amademoni awangisizi.

Ion Igobolondo kuyinto cishe posix Shell kusuka ku-redox, nayo esebenza ku-unix, ngenhloso ye- futhiukusebenza emafasiteleni, noma kungasebenzi ATTOW. Inhloso yalo ukumane ube yigobolondo elingcono, ngakho-ke kuthatha okuhle kusuka ku-posix bese kungezwa kukho. Kubukeka sengathi kugxile ekunikezeni ulimi oluhle lokubhala, kepha hhayi ulwazi oluhle kakhulu lokusebenzisana, igobolondo lezinhlanzi lingonakalisile, futhi angibuyeli kugobolondo ngaphandle isigaba sokuqala ukuxhumana.

Igobolondo lamafutha inomgomo wokufaka esikhundleni se-bash, okuyinto encomekayo, noma kunjalo ibhekise kuphela ezinhlelweni ze-unix ezingenayo iWindows ebonakalayo. Igxile ekulungiseni ungqimba lokuhambisana kwe-bash kuze kube manje, ngezinhlelo zesikhathi esizayo zokugxila engxenyeni yokuxhumana. Uma sibheka iqiniso lokuthi ingxenye exhumanayo yegobolondo ayikabhalwa, kungenza ngibe nokungabaza okuncane ngekusasa layo futhi yize ngithemba ukuthi ayibhaliwe, I feat ingase ivule umusi ngaphambi kokuba ifinyelele ezinhlosweni zayo ebezihlosiwe. Futhi ukuntuleka kokusekelwa kwamawindows akulungile.

I-Rash igobolondo elinokusekelwa kwedatha ehlelekile esebenza nayo Racket izinto, lapho ngibheka i-racket ngaphezulu ngizozama, yize isipiliyoni sami esedlule nge igobolondo le-emacs ] ayiyinhle ngempela, ngoba eshell isebenza kuphela ngaphakathi kwama-emac, futhi ayisebenzi kahle njenge igobolondo lesistimu ... ngaphandle kokuthi uhlelo lwakho lube ngama-emacs (yize ama-emacs engumhleli wami omkhulu futhi ngiyabhala ezinye lisp, akuyona uhlelo lwami lokusebenza). (Lapha kufanele futhi ngikhulume ngeJulia REPL, impendulo engcono kakhulu yanoma yiluphi ulimi lohlelo).

Igobolondo lamandla I-Powershell, igobolondo elikhulu leWindows lisebenza futhi ku-linux nakuma-macs, ngenxa yesikhulumi esiphambanweni NET . Kepha kunesenzo kakhulu, kuhamba kancane, futhi mhlawumbe (akuqinisekisiwe) kugcwele amafasitela ; Kuyinto enkulu kimi.

Igobolondo le-Nu... impela songa okungcono kakhulu ekugcineni. Lokhu mhlawumbe kungukuya kwami ​​okulandelayo kuShell; ukunakwa kwesigaba sokuqala sokusebenzisana, ukucatshangelwa ngokucophelela kwegobolondo ngalinye elenziwe ngepulatifomu, kanye nombhalo ohleliwe.

Amagobolondo angekho kulolu hlu i-ATTOW kungenzeka ukuthi abhekwe njengangajabulisi ngokwanele.

Thumela Amathegi: izinhlelo, igobolondo
Julayi 16, 2021

Igobolondo lezinhlanziyigobolondo lami engilithandayo ngesikhathi sokubhala. Inani lama-plugins afakiwe lincane kakhulu, ngoba lenza izinto eziningi ongazifuna kuShell ngaphandle kwebhokisi . Iskripthi sihamba kancane kune-zsh kepha akekho onendaba nesivinini sokubhala ngakho-ke kulungile. I-syntax yinhle ngefa le-ML (njengoJulia) ngezitatimende zokuphela, esikhundleni sezinsimbi ezisontekile. Ukubhala imibhalo kusetshenziswa kakhulu kune-bash / zsh kepha futhi kufundeka kakhulu. Izinto ezinjengokufaka esikhundleni senqubo, ukuhlanganiswa kwentambo kanye namapayipi kugcina isenzo esithe xaxa. Ine global okuguqukayo, okwabiwe kuzo zonke izinqubo ezisebenzayo, kanye indawo yonke okuguqukayo, okwabiwe ngezikhathi zonke, okwenza izinto zibe lula ngaphandle kokubhala konke phansi nokuthola imibhalo ekhohlwayo.

Elvish ingabe igobolondo elinokusekelwa kwezinto eziningi, njenge-daemon noma imodi yewebhu evumela ukuthi ithumele imiyalo kude ...? Ngicabanga ukuthi kuningi kakhulu futhi ngiqala ukuyibiza ngokuqumba. I-IMHO igobolondo kufanele ilwele ukuba lula, futhi ibe nokuqukethwe. Ngicabanga ukuthi amagobolondo kufanele aklanyelwe ukuphatha izimo lapho izinqubo ziveza inani elivelele lezikhathi, eziziphatha ngokungaguquki kusukela ekuqaleni kuze kube sekugcineni futhi eziqukethe ngokwazo ukuze zikwazi ukusingatha izingozi ngomusa. Ngakho-ke ngaphandle kwazo zonke ezinye izici (njengedatha ehlelekile) ... amademoni awangisizi.

Ion Igobolondo kuyinto cishe posix Shell kusuka ku-redox, nayo esebenza ku-unix, ngenhloso ye- futhiukusebenza emafasiteleni, noma kungasebenzi ATTOW. Inhloso yalo ukumane ube yigobolondo elingcono, ngakho-ke kuthatha okuhle kusuka ku-posix bese kungezwa kukho. Kubukeka sengathi kugxile ekunikezeni ulimi oluhle lokubhala, kepha hhayi ulwazi oluhle kakhulu lokusebenzisana, igobolondo lezinhlanzi lingonakalisile, futhi angibuyeli kugobolondo ngaphandle isigaba sokuqala ukuxhumana.

Igobolondo lamafutha inomgomo wokufaka esikhundleni se-bash, okuyinto encomekayo, noma kunjalo ibhekise kuphela ezinhlelweni ze-unix ezingenayo iWindows ebonakalayo. Igxile ekulungiseni ungqimba lokuhambisana kwe-bash kuze kube manje, ngezinhlelo zesikhathi esizayo zokugxila engxenyeni yokuxhumana. Uma sibheka iqiniso lokuthi ingxenye exhumanayo yegobolondo ayikabhalwa, kungenza ngibe nokungabaza okuncane ngekusasa layo futhi yize ngithemba ukuthi ayibhaliwe, I feat ingase ivule umusi ngaphambi kokuba ifinyelele ezinhlosweni zayo ebezihlosiwe. Futhi ukuntuleka kokusekelwa kwamawindows akulungile.

I-Rash igobolondo elinokusekelwa kwedatha ehlelekile esebenza nayo Racket izinto, lapho ngibheka i-racket ngaphezulu ngizozama, yize isipiliyoni sami esedlule nge igobolondo le-emacs ] ayiyinhle ngempela, ngoba eshell isebenza kuphela ngaphakathi kwama-emac, futhi ayisebenzi kahle njenge igobolondo lesistimu ... ngaphandle kokuthi uhlelo lwakho lube ngama-emacs (yize ama-emacs engumhleli wami omkhulu futhi ngiyabhala ezinye lisp, akuyona uhlelo lwami lokusebenza). (Lapha kufanele futhi ngikhulume ngeJulia REPL, impendulo engcono kakhulu yanoma yiluphi ulimi lohlelo).

Igobolondo lamandla I-Powershell, igobolondo elikhulu leWindows lisebenza futhi ku-linux nakuma-macs, ngenxa yesikhulumi esiphambanweni NET . Kepha kunesenzo kakhulu, kuhamba kancane, futhi mhlawumbe (akuqinisekisiwe) kugcwele amafasitela ; Kuyinto enkulu kimi.

Igobolondo le-Nu... impela songa okungcono kakhulu ekugcineni. Lokhu mhlawumbe kungukuya kwami ​​okulandelayo kuShell; ukunakwa kwesigaba sokuqala sokusebenzisana, ukucatshangelwa ngokucophelela kwegobolondo ngalinye elenziwe ngepulatifomu, kanye nombhalo ohleliwe.

Amagobolondo angekho kulolu hlu i-ATTOW kungenzeka ukuthi abhekwe njengangajabulisi ngokwanele.

Thumela Amathegi: izinhlelo, igobolondo
Agasti 24, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
• Isibukeli ui kufanele sibe ne-50% yomdlalo obonakala njalo. Lokhu kusho ikhamera yomdlalo.

  • Imininingwane ebambezelayo ibalulekile, ukunikeza isikhathi sokufunda umqondo obalulekile wokuhlakanipha komdlalo, nokwenza izibukeli zibe lula kulo mdlalo. Mayelana nalokhu, i amathiphu wamathuluzi we-dota 2 ukunwetshwa kwe-twitch kwenza imininingwane ebambezelayo ingabaluleki kangako, njengoba ukuxhumana kolwazi kuba lula kakhulu.

  • Izikhathi zesikhathi semicimbi: nganoma yisiphi isikhathi esithile lapho kwenzeka wonke umdlalo, kufanele sikwazi ukulinganisa okwamanje isigaba lomdlalo. Ingabe umdlalo uqala? ngomfutho wayo omkhulu? kuyaphela? Lokhu kufanele kube yimina ngaphezu kwewashi futhi esikhundleni salokho faka okubalulekile izingqopha-mlando ezinquma umphumela womdlalo.

Thumela Amathegi: imidlalo
Juni 26, 2021

item.author: untoreh

breadcrumb.text: Steps to setup a new phone

item.turbo:content:
• Thola ifoni ngokuya ngokuncamelayo, amadili we-amazon warehouse noma i-aliexpress eyenziwe kabusha ine-bang engcono kakhulu ye-buck AFAIK.

  • Ifoni ingadinga ikhodi yokuvula kumenzi

  • Ngena ku-fastbootoem unlock uma idinga ikhodi

  • Cabanga uma i-OEM stock firmware kufanele ikhanyiswe kusuka ku-fastboot ngaphambi kokukhanyisa i-ROM yangokwezifiso (hlola i-flashfile.xml)

  • Khanyisa ukutakulafastboot flash recovery twrp.bin

  • Qalisa ekubuyiseleni i-flash rom

  • I-Flash microG ngokusebenzisa iskripthi sokusetha esingekho emthethweni

  • I-Flash magisk

  • Isikhiphi seMagisk module ukususa amamojula abangela ama-bootloops ekululameni

  • Mhlawumbe khanyisa i-kernel yangokwezifiso

  • Hlola ukuzihlola kwe-microG ukubona ukuthi yini edinga ukulungiswa (i-apk spoofing, nlp enobunye, njll.)

  • Faka i-xposed nge-magisk

  • Lungiselela umgadli wenhlanhla

  • Faka izimakethe: f-droid, aurora, aptoide

  • Faka okunye esikhundleni sezinhlelo zokusebenza: ikhalenda-> etar, imiyalezo-> isiginali (iseshini?), Imeyili-> deltachat (noma lutho ..), ikhibhodi-> anysoftkb, amafayela-> mixplorer, browser-> bromite / firefox, youtube-> newpipe, ikhamera-> vula ikhamera, umculo-> vynil / igilamafoni, izindawo zokusebenzela-> indawo yokuhlala

  • Izinhlelo zokusebenza zebhethri: ama-betterbatterystats, misa ukushaja ibhethri (akufanele kudingeke), yenza kube lula

Thumela Amathegi: Imihlahlandlela
Juni 27, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Kunezindlela ezahlukahlukene zokufaka kwekhibhodi zama-Smartphones:

  • Ukuthayipha okujwayelekile

  • Ukuthayipha isithupha

  • Ukuswayipha okujwayelekile

  • Ukuthayipha kwe-Compact (T9)

Ukuswayipha okokufaka okumbili kuhlolwe okuncane kakhulu. Ukuphela kwekhibhodi engikutholile ukusebenzisa isixazululo esihle sokusebenza yile ikhibhodi69.

Kungani kungavamile kangaka?

  • Ukusetshenziswa kunzima. Ukufakwa okuningi kusho ukuthi kunezinqubo ze-async ezigcwalisa i-buffer yokufaka okufanele icelwe abaqokelwe ukuqeda kumcimbi ngamunye omusha.

  • Kudinga ukufunda okuthile kumsebenzisi, lokhu kukwenza kungathandeki, ngoba lapho kuphakama ijika lokufunda kuye kwaba kuncane ukugcinwa komsebenzisi.

Thumela Amathegi: izibani ezikhanyayo, ubuchwepheshe
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Umgomo

Ngabe ufuna ukwahlukanisa nini ukuxhumana okukodwa kwe-TCP kokuningi? Imvamisa usebenzisa i- umhubhe ukuzuza okuphambene ngqo . Icala lami lokusebenzisa lalibalekela ukulinganiselwa komkhawulokudonsa kunethiwekhi yeselula, ngakho-ke izivivinyo zenziwa nge-sim khadi kungasekho datha esele kuhlelo lwayo[1].

Isebenza kanjani

I- umhubhe ibhalwe ngesi- golang ngoba ishesha ngokwanele, futhi ijwayele ukusetshenziselwa ithuluzi lenethiwekhi. I-cli ayisebenziseki kalula ngoba izinketho eziningi ziphinde zasebenza njengoba ngivivinya izindlela ezahlukahlukene.

Ekuqaleni bekukhona "ama-flings" kanye "nama-lassos", ukwahlukanisa inani lokuxhuma kokuphumayo (okunamaphiko) nokungenayo (okushisiwe), kepha lokhu bekungukukhishwa okungadingekile ngoba kungcono ukumaka amaphakethe ngendawo okuyiwa kuyo, yize inhloso enkulu bekungukuthi ukunikela ngemikhawulo yamazinga ehlukene wokuxhumeka okuphumayo nokungenayo, ngakho-ke ukwahlukaniswa kwezinga eliphakeme phakathi kokuya phezulu / phansi kubonakala kusebenza.

Iklayenti kufanele lifake konke ukuxhumana njengoba sicabanga ukuthi iseva ayikwazi ukuvula ukuxhumana okuphumayo. Lapho amaklayenti ethola ukuxhumeka kusuka kuhlelo lokusebenza lomsebenzisi, kusetha indawo edingekayo yokuxhumana neseva, futhi noma iyiphi idatha eyitholayo, iyayihlukanisa phakathi kokuxhumana okuzinikele, ngokusho komkhawulo ochazwe umsebenzisi.

Amaphakethe athunyelwa kuseva, okumele iwahlele kabusha ngendlela efanele, ngoba ukuxhumana okuhlukile kwe-TCP kungaqeda ukusakazwa kwedatha nganoma yisiphi isikhathi (i-oda elithunyelwe alihlonishwa, ngoba umzila ), bese idluliselwa kuhlelo lokusebenza olutholayo.

Ukuxhumeka kuvaliwe futhi okusha kuvulwa njengoba umkhawulo wedatha omisiwe ngokuxhumeka kufinyelelwa, kufana nokuthi kwenziwa kanjani ukuthungathaidatha yomhubhe yama-proxies ekusakazeni okuhlukile ngenhloso yokufihla ukusebenza kwemifudlana yedatha, ngaphandle kokuthi umhubhe wethu ukwenza lokho kaningi ngangokunokwenzeka.

Kungani kusebenza

Inhloso lapha ukulawula ukuthi konke ukuxhumana kufanele kusingathe idatha engakanani. Ngezinhloso zethu, bekungakaze kube ngaphezu kwalokho bekuvame ukuba yi MTU usayizi wewindi. Ungacabanga nge-MTU njengomkhawulo ongaphezulu wocezu lwedatha oludlula kuyo yonke inethiwekhi, futhi bekuyinjongo yethu ngoba besifuna ukweqa umkhawulo wamazinga we-bandwidth wenethiwekhi evaliwe. Ukunciphisa inani ledatha iklayenti elingadlula kulo, udinga bala kulungile, akunjalo? Uma umqondo wakho usebenza ngento efana ne-do-while

  • tholapacket

    • umareceived_packets + packet > user_limit

      • drop uxhumano

    • okunye

      • qhubeka usakaza

Ngemuva kwalokho udinga okungenani thola i-packet . Angiqiniseki ukuthi ngabe yilokhu okwenzeka ngempela, noma isizathu sokuthi umhubhe wami usebenze kungenye futhi. Mhlawumbe kungenzeka ngokuphelele ukubheka ngisho nephakethe lokuqala, kepha ngokombono wedizayini, lokho kungasho ukuthi kuzofanela uhlole konke ukuxhumana okukodwa, okungenza uhlelo lube buthakathaka ekuhlaselweni kwe-DOS, futhi yebo umhubhe wami ungasetshenziswa kalula njengethuluzi elisebenza kahle le-DOS / Stress, ngoba ungahlukanisa idatha kumaphakethe amancane kakhulu (okusho ukuthi ukuxhumana kwe-TCP kuzoba nengcindezi ephezulu yokuphinda usebenzise kabusha ) futhi ube nedamu lokuxhuma elikhulu ngendlela othanda ngayo.

Ukuhlolwa kwamachweba ahlukile futhi kukhombisile ukuthi kungenzeka kuphela kuphela ezinye amachweba, nokuthi umkhawulo ubuhlala uhlukile phakathi kwamachweba, nge443 kunikeza elinye lamawindi aphakeme, nxazonke20kb , ukuqagela ngobaTLS ukuxhawulana kudinga idatha eningi, nokuthi le mikhawulo yamazinga izoshintsha ngokuya ngesikhathi sosuku[2].

Imiphumela

Ngizamile ukusula ukufaka amakhodi ngethemba lokukhuphula idatha. Ngokusebenzisa umtapo wolwazi wokufaka amakhodi nokusula / ukuqopha imininingwane uqobo lwayo, nangokumbondelana I-KCP umthetho olandelwayo ngenqubo yami yokuhlukanisa. Ukuzama i-KCP kungahle kubonakale kuyindlela ebuyela emuva, ngoba ithengisa ukubambezeleka okungcono kokudlula okuphansi, kepha ukucabanga kwami ​​kokuqala ukuthi ibhodlela lami lalixhumano lehla phakathi kokudluliswa, okungadala amaphakethe amaningi onakele, ngakho-ke bengingazuza okuphezulu ukungena ngokulungiswa kwephutha.

Kuvele ukuthi bekungumkhawulo nje wokulinganiselwa ngaphezulu kokuxhumana okungakanani kwe-TCP iklayenti elingakuthumela ngenethiwekhi, ngakho-ke ukuvikelwa kwe-DOS engingakwazi ukwenza lutho ngakho. Ngemuva kwamanani we-X wokuxhumeka noma yikuphiSYN imizamo yeka ukwamukela okufaneleACK , ukugcwalisa ukusilela emuva futhi ekugcineni wenze itafula elincane. Ukuzama nephutha kukhombisile ukuthi kungenzeka phakathi kwe-4-8[3] ukuxhumana kuvulwa nganoma yisiphi isikhathi, futhi nge-MTU ye-500-1000 bytes ungagcina ukusakaza okuzinzile okungenani okuzungezile128kbps , uma ukusakaza njalo bekungeyona imfuneko, ungafinyelela isivinini esiphakeme esikhathini esifushane ngo- kuqhuma ukuxhumana okuningi ngokufunwa.

Ngokuphambene, a (true)DNS umhubhe awucindezeli kanzima56kbps futhi ngisheshe ngishayeke ngoba ngicabanga ukuthi inombolo ephezulu yezicelo ze-DNS ibukeka isolisa kakhulu bese kuba izicelo ze-TCP. Kufanele sicacise ukuthi atrue Idatha yomhubhe we-DNS (ephumayo) idatha ngaphezulu kwezizinda ezingekho mbumbulu futhi inquma idatha (engenayo) etholwe ngokubuza amarekhodi e-DNS, kanti kwesinye isikhathi umhubhe we-DNS ungacatshangwa ukuthi ukuxhumeka okuluhlaza kwe-UDP ethekwini le-DNS, okungenzeka ukuthi esikhathini esithile esedlule, amaseva e-DNS kuvunyelwe futhi kudluliswa kahle.

Iziphetho

Angiqiniseki ukuthi ngifinyelele umgomo wami Umbuso ukuhlakanipha, ngoba ukusebenzisa uhlobo olunjalo lomhubhe kungakwenza ushise kakhulu, futhi kumoshe ibhethri eliningi, kepha ukuba nakho njengokuxhumeka kwesipele kungakhuthaza ... uma ngikhathazwa ukukwenza uzinze ngokwanele :)

[1] imvamisa lapho ikhadi le-sim lingenayo enye idatha yokuphequlula iwebhu, izicelo zewebhu ziqondisa kabusha esangweni lokuthwebula (ukukutshela ukuthi uthenge idatha eningi)
[2] izinhlelo zedatha yeselula zingahlinzeka ngoxhumano olungcono ngezikhathi zasebusuku
[3] Le nombolo, eqondaniswe nokubalwa okujwayelekile, ingahle ikwenze usole ukuthi i-kernel ikhawulela ukuxhumana ngandlela thile, isimo sokuxhuma okuvuliwe komhubhe wethu asijwayelekile neze, kepha ukulungisa izinkinobho ze-linux akukaze kunikeze imiphumela engcono ekugcineni kwami.

Thumela Amathegi: inetha, mayelana
Ephreli 08, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Ake sihlukanise ukupheka ngezinyathelo ezine bese sihlaziya ngasinye sazo:

  • Ukuhlanza

  • Ukuxuba

  • Ukushisa

  • Ukuphumula

Ukuhlanza

Ukuthenga

Esinyathelweni sokuqala sibheka nenqubo ye- ukuzuza izithako. Izitolo zesaphulelo zimnandi ngenxa yeminikelo ebanzi, ungasebenza ezungeze impilo eshalofini emfushane iqhwa noma yini ongahlose ukuyisebenzisa ngokushesha.

Ukugcina nokulungiselela

Ake sicabangele amanye amaqembu anezeluleko ezithile:

  • Izithelo nemifino: Ukufaka emanzini / uviniga okungenani isigamu sehora kungasiza inqubo yokuhlanza, uma zigcwele ukungcola. Kungasiza futhi ukuvuselelwa kabusha, yize kunjalo kuleli cala sikhuluma okungenani isigamu sosuku lokujuluka (futhi kungabi ngaphezu kwamahora angama-48, ngoba amabhaktheriya). Ngemifino ungasebenzisa cishe yonke into, kepha imvamisa siyazilahla izingxenye ezinzima ezithatha isikhathi eside ukupheka, kepha uma uhlukanisa izingxenye ezinzima, unga hlanganisa uzipheke ngokwehlukana (ukwenza, isobho noma izinongo, noma okhilimu). Izithelo zezithelo zinjalo futhi, njengomthetho-wesithupha, kufanele kuphontshwe amakhasi anezikali, lapho ubushelelezi besikhumba kungenzeka kakhulu (buhlanzeke) buhlanzeke futhi budliwe, ngaphandle kobhanana. Ungayisebenzisi ikhasi lezithelo ezisawolintshi ngaphandle kokuthi kuthiwe kungokwemvelo. Akuwona wonke amakhasi ezithelo amnandi, amanye anobuthi ngokwemvelo, njengophayinaphu, noma ungaphikisana nokuthi amanani abalulekile. ( i.e. kukhona utshwala obenziwe ngembewu ye-apula, ngaphandle kwembewu yanoma yisiphi isithelo esivela ku- rosacea umndeni wezitshalo oqukethe umthamo omncane we-cyanide).

  • Imidumba: Ama-legumes omisiwe adinga ukuwashwa okumbalwa, ngoba angakwazi ukuqoqa uthuli nezinye izinhlayiya ngesikhathi sokulondolozwa. Nakekela izindawo zokugcina, izinhlobo eziningi zezimbungulu zingondla kuzo, zisebenzise eqinile amabhokisi okugcina, hhayi izikhwama. Inani lokuwasha lincike ekutheni kanjani ukujiya igobolondo le legume. Imidumba ehlukaniswe njengobhontshisi nama-chickpeas idinga amahora amahle angama-24, imidumba emincane efana nodali ilungile ngamahora ambalwa.

  • Izimpushana: Njengofulawa noshukela. Uma indawo yokugcina ingomile ngokwanele, ungahle udinge hlunga impushana yokudiliza iqoqo elisungulwe ngenxa ye- umswakama . Izimbungulu ezinjengezinundu nazo azilungile kufulawa, zisebenzisa isitoreji esihle.

Ukuzisika

Ungasika ngemimese, kepha kunamathuluzi amaningi ashibhile ongawathenga asiza ukunciphisa imifino nezithelo zibe izingcezu, noma ukuxova izimpushana ezimahhadla noma ezicolekileyo. Kungenzeka basebenzise indlela ethile yasentwasahlobo, noma babe nesimo esilingana nezithelo / imifino ethile.

Amaqanda

Amaqanda anokutholwa okubanzi ekuphekeni, asetshenziswa njenge:

  • ama-emulsifiers (gcina izinto zihlangene ngendlela ewuketshezi ebushelelezi)

  • izibopho (hlala izinto ndawonye ngendlela eqinile)

  • imvubelo (ingabamba umoya futhi ivuse inhlama) Amaqanda enziwa ngesikhupha (amafutha) nomhlophe (amaprotheni namanzi). Umhlophe usebenziseka kakhulu ekubambeni / ekubiliseni okuqinile, isikhupha se-emulsifying cream, noma ekuhlobiseni. Ukukhumbula la maqiniso, khetha ukuthi uwasebenzisa kanjani amaqanda, bese usebenzisa i isihlukanisi seqanda ukusebenzisa i-yolk nabamhlophe njengezithako ezahlukahlukene. Lapho ushaya amaqanda, uwafudumeze (angadluli ku-30C) futhi engeza amaconsi ambalwa kalamula (noma i-citric acid) kungasiza inqubo yokufaka.

Ukuxuba

Ngesikhathi sokuxuba sizama ukunikeza ilungelo isimo futhi ukungaguquguquki esihlokweni sethu.

Ukuhleleka

Imvamisa ufuna ukuxuba ngamaqembu, okuqinile nokuqinile, noketshezi okunoketshezi. Ngama-solid siqonde impuphu njengezithako, nangoketshezi noma yini engabambi ukuma kwayo. Ngaphandle kokuthi ufuna umoya, lapho-ke uhlanganisa ushukela nebhotela.

Kuyabanda noma Kuyashisa?

Uma wenza ikhekhe ufuna ibhotela lincibilike kuqala ngaphambi ukuxubana, uma wenza u-ayisikhilimu, ufuna izingcezu ezingcezwini zeqhwa lokho Kuzohlanganiswa ndawonye. Uma uhlanganisa ama-alimondi noshukela ukwenza i-nougat, ufuna ukuthi babande kuwo gwema i-caramelization kashukela, obekungavimba ukwakheka kokunamathisela.

Isikhathi

Kwesinye isikhathi kubalulekile ukunaka isikhathi senqubo yokuxuba. Ukwenza inhlama yamathets ufuna ukuthi ibe mfushane, ukuze ukuvimbela ukuthuthukiswa kwezibopho ze-gluten, obekunganikeza ukuqina kwekhekhe elibhakwe. Ukuxuba uketshezi oluningi osuvele uphethe umoya (njengamaqanda ashayiwe noma ibhotela / ushukela ukuxuba) kwephula amagwebu omoya futhi kuvumela wonke umoya phunyuka umshayi. Ngokuphambene nalokho lapho uxuba inhlama yesinkwa, ufuna ukunika inqubo yokuxuba isikhathi esanele sokuvumela izibopho ze-gluten ukuthi zizinikele ukuqina enhlama ebalulekile ngemuva kwalokho ukubumba isinkwa bese usinika amandla wokusebenza vuka ngesikhathi senqubo yokusekela.

Ubuningi

Ukungeza wonke amafutha ngasikhathi sinye, njengamafutha, kungenza inhlama okuxekethile ukungaguquguquki kwayo, kuyaphula kube yizicucu ezincane. Ufuna ukufaka kancane kancane amafutha ku ibhalansi ukudalwa kwe-gluten nge ukumuncwa kwamafutha . Ngendlela efanayo engeza izithako ezinjengamanzi noma ubisi ngasikhathi sinye akuwona umqondo omuhle. Kulula ukusebenza ngenhlama lapho kuhlanganiswa khona okuqinile neziphuzo, futhi kuyasiza amaphutha amabala phakathi imithamo ngokushesha kunokuba kamuva. Izithako ezahlukahlukene zinokuqukethwe okuhlukile kwamanzi. Ungathola ukuthi isithako sinamanzi angakanani ngokuhlola amaqiniso wokudla okunempilo bese ukukhipha kusuka kunani eliphelele (imvamisa100g ), i- Isamba samaprotheni, amafutha, nama-carbohydrate. Isisindo samaminerali namavithamini asinakwa. Okuqukethwe okuphelele kwamanzi kubalulekile ukugwema inhlama ekubeni yi-batter ne-viceversa. Ezinye izithako (njengamazambane, nezithelo / imifino ehlanganisiwe ngokujwayelekile) zingabamba amanzi amaningi, ngoba imicu ivimbela ezinye izithako ezifana nofulawa ukuthi zingamunci amanzi amaningi, kepha inhlama evelayo isagcina inamathele futhi kunzima ukuyiphatha.

Imvubelo

  • Imvubelo yamakhemikhali: i-sodium / potassium bicarbonate noma iphawuda wokubhaka , engezwe ku ukuphela wenqubo yokuxuba, khetha ukuxubana okusheshayo.

  • Imvubelo engokwemvelo: imvubelo kusuka kubhiya, noma iyogathi, noma kwifomu elomile (lempuphu). Ukungezwa kancane kancane ngesikhathi senqubo yokuxuba.

    • Ama-ejenti afaka imvubelo asebenza kangcono ngamazinga okushisa ngaphezulu kune20C futhi Ngaphansi kune30C.

    • Ukuvutshelwa kuyaqhubeka inqobo nje uma amazinga okushisa engaphezulu kuka-0, kwehlisa ijubane nayo amazinga okushisa aphansi futhi futhi amazinga okushisa aphezulu . Sebenzisa ifriji ne-ovini (ukukhanya) ukuya lawula singakanani isikhathi sokunikelwa ekuvutsheni.

    • Umswakama ophezulu kubalulekile ekuthuthukiseni imvubelo. Ingilazi yamanzi eduze kwenhlama ingasiza (futhi ibagcine endaweni ebiyelwe ukuze umswakama wesicupho , noma umboze ngendwangu)

    • ushukela omncane owengeziwe kungasiza inqubo yokuvutshelwa, kepha imvamisa okusanhlamvu okuvela enhlama sekuvele kushukela okwanele

    • Usawoti can yehlisa kancane ijubane ukuvutshelwa, nosawoti omningi ungabulala imvubelo ngokuphelele.

    • Inqubo yokuvutshelwa iguqula ushukela ube amaprotheni, isikhutha kanye nama-asidi. Ukuvutshelwa okuningi nenhlama izokonakala. Njengomthetho wesithupha,2 days ngenhlama egcinwe ku lokushisa ekamelweni, 2 weeks ngenhlama egcinwe ku- ifriji.

  • Imvubelo yemishini: amaqanda ashayiwe, ibhotela enokhilimu, izithelo ezihlanganisiwe . Lezi zithako ziyakwazi umoya ogibe ngakho-ke yenza ukwanda lapho uxubene ngaphakathi kwenhlama ngesikhathi sokubhaka njengoba umoya uzama phunyuka kusukela kumabhamuza.

  • Imvubelo kamama iyinhlama ebilisiwe ngokulingene, igcinwa njalo ihlanzekile (ngokufaka amanzi nofulawa ngezikhathi ezithile, nokususa indawo endala), ejwayele ukwenziwa ukukhahlela phansi ukuvutshelwa kwezinhlama ezintsha, isilinganiso saso singu-1 / 4..1 / 3 wenhlama entsha. Izindawo ezinkulu ezimnyama zimbi (kusho ukonakala), amachashazi amancane kakhulu alungile, imvamisa umphumela we-oxidation.

  • Umkhiqizo ovutshiwe:

    • Iwayini: ukuvutshelwa kwe- izithelo (yize ngokusemthethweni ukuvutshelwa kwezithelo kusuka vitis vinifera kungabizwa ngewayini, ngicabanga ukuthi kulungile ukwenza ukuvutshelwa kwezithelo njengewayini.)[1]

    • Ubhiya: ukuvutshelwa kwe okusanhlamvu

    • I-yogurt: ukuvutshelwa kwe- ubisi

    • Ushizi (Hhayi konke): Ukuvutshelwa kwe- ubisi olujiyile ngemuva kokuhlunga

    • Abanye:

      • IKombucha: Ibilile itiye

      • Mead: kubilile uju

    • Uviniga: kubilile iwayini (i-yeast yeast iguqula ushukela ube yi-alcohol, uviniga yeasts uguqula utshwala bube yi-acetic acid) Kunezinhlanganisela zamakhemikhali ezingangezwa kuziphuzo ezivutshiwe ukulawula i-asidi, umbala, ukunambitheka ..:

  • i-ascorbic acid (uvithamini C) (ivimbela namachibi)

  • i-potassium bicarbonate (inciphisa i-asidi)

  • i-anhydride enesibabule (ibamba kancane ukuvutshelwa)

  • i-tartaric acid (ivimbela crystallization ewayinini)

  • I-Bentonite (ivimbela amafu)

  • I-Arabic Gum (iqinisa ukunambitheka)

  • Umhlaba we-diatomaceous (kubi, ungasebenzisi)

  • i-potassium metabisolphite (ingagwenywa) Uhlu aluphelele, njalo cwaninga noma yiliphi ikhemikhali olifunayo ofuna ukulisebenzisa emikhiqizweni yakho ebilile.

Izilinganiso zama-Doughs

Ama-preps ahlukile adinga izilinganiso ezahlukahlukene zalezi zithako:

  • Ufulawa (okusanhlamvu, amantongomane, imbewu, imidumba, njll.)

  • Amaqanda (izithelo noma iyogathi, njll.)

  • Amanzi (Ubisi, amasoso, iwayini elihlanjululwe, njll.)

  • Ushukela (okucacile, okuluhlaza, ukhukhunathi, njll.)

  • Amafutha (Amafutha, ibhotela, isinqumelo, njll.) Ungathola ama-cheat sheet kuwebhu afinyelela kokuhle itafula izilinganiso zezinhlobo zebhikawozi ezivame kakhulu. Akuyona yonke into eshintshanayo; ufulawa ongekho okusanhlamvu awunayo i-gluten eyanele futhi inhlama evelayo iyohlala iqhubeka ngokuxakaniseka, idinga ama-ejenti amaningi abophayo. Kunezinye izindlela zoshukela ezifana lezwasil, erythritol , njll. kepha ushukela nawo ubalulekile ekwakhiweni kwawo kwamakristalu, okwengeza ukuthungwa, futhi okusiza ukwakheka kwamabhamuza omoya. Isakhiwo se-crystalline asihlali siphindaphindeka kwezinye izindlela zikashukela, ngakho-ke kungadingeka ukuthi okungenani ulinganise nama-ejenti amaningi abilayo.

Ukushisa

  • Ukuphendula kukaMaillard : Amaprotheni, amafutha kanye noshukela ahlangana phakathi kwawo abe ama-molecule ayinkimbinkimbi. Yilokhu okunikeza ukunambitheka lapho upheka. Iyanda ngamazinga okushisa aphezulu nokuqukethwe kwamanzi aphansi (kuze kufike ekushiseni), ngakho-ke ivelele kakhulu ku- ubuso wento ephekiwe. Lokhu kulandela ukuthi uma ukusika Izinto zibe yizicucu ezincane, ngakho-ke ukwandisa indawo engaphezulu uzophela ngokunambitheka okwengeziwe (kungahle kube nento enambitheka kakhulu). Kuyafaneleka lapho kubhakwa, ukwenza i-toast, ukosa kanye nokuthosa, zonke izindlela zokupheka ezinamanzi aphansi noma angenawo nhlobo.

  • I-Caramelization : lapho ushukela uxubana namanzi ngethempelesha ephezulu, njengoba ukusabela kuqhubeka, amanzi ayahwamuka futhi ushukela usha ubemuncu. I-Caramelization isiza ekunikezeni ukudla uqweqwe oluqinile, nolushubile.

  • Kuyakhuphuka: Ukufeza ukukhuphuka kuvamile ukushisa kuhhavini ngaphambi kokudala ukuze kwenziwe umehluko ophakeme ngokwanele wokushisa ku lukhuni ingaphandle lenhlama, njengokuthi umusi ubhajwe ngaphakathi kuqinisa inhlama ibheke phezulu. Kepha kufanele uqaphele ngokulinganisela amazinga okushisa nge-prep yonke[2] amazinga omswakama. Uma i-prep isome kakhulu, ukushisa kwangaphambili kuzoholela ku kushe uqweqwe nengaphakathi elingaphekiwe.

  • Iphuzu lokubhema : Amafutha ahlukene shabalala emazingeni okushisa ahlukene, cishe:

    • ibhotela: ~ 180C

    • uwoyela womnqumo: ~ 200C

    • amafutha avela kumantongomane: ~ 210C

    • uwoyela ovela embewini: ~ 220C Ungadluli kulawa mazinga okushisa kuye ngokuthi ngawaphi amafutha owasebenzisayo. Lokhu akunakugwenywa lapho usebenzisa i- izitofu , ezimweni lapho okuqukethwe kwamanzi ekudleni kungalinganisa amazinga okushisa aphezulu kakhulu. ( Lokungeniswa ama-cooktops akuvumela ukuthi ulawule amazinga okushisa). Izinqubo zokuthosa noma uku-browning zingadinga amazinga okushisa aphezulu, kepha ukugcina ngaphansi kwephuzu lokubhema kusenganikeza imiphumela eyamukelekayo noma kunjalo.

  • Ukuphefumula : Ukusebenzisa ifeni lapho ukubhaka kunikeza ukushisa okuthe xaxa ngaphakathi kuhhavini, kepha futhi kuyomisa isivinini sokulungiselela ngokushesha, kungadala ukupheka okungaphekiwe. Musa ukubeka i-prep eduze nefeni uqobo, umfutho womoya mubi.

  • Ukunamathela : Sebenzisa amapani nezinti ezingezona izinti, ngaphandle kwalapho i-prep ingamanzi kakhulu, njengesobho noma imifino ebilisiwe. Ngokubhaka, amashidi angenantambo akuvumela ngezifiso ukwakheka kwenhlama, futhi ngokushiya umngcele wamashidi athile, kuvumela ukukhipha okulula kokulungiselela okubhakiwe kusuka epanini (okungabekwa esitsheni ukuphumula). Womabili amapani non-stick namashidi enziwe teflon , futhi i-teflon ayidlali kahle ngamazinga okushisa ngenhla kuka-280C.

  • Amajamu : Lapho wenza ujamu, ukushisa yiokudala evumela ushukela ukuthi ubophele kuma-pectin molecule (avela emanzini). I-acid ilinganisa lolu shintsho, alwanele futhi kuzothatha nzima ukuthi ushukela uphume emanzini, ngokweqile futhi amaketanga kashukela abamba amanzi azobe evuleke kakhulu, angalokothi avumele i-jelly ukuthi ikwakhe (ikushiye nesiraphu efana noketshezi) . Ungakhuphula i-jellyness ngokungeza ngokwengeziwe i-pectin (esitolo esithengiwe), noma uqaphele ngezithelo, ngoba izithelo ezahlukahlukene zinokuqukethwe okuhlukile kwe-pectin, futhi i-pectin iyancipha njengoba izithelo zivuthwa.

  • Ukunciphisa Amanzi : Uma ubilisa ama-preps njengesobho, ujamu, ama-chutneys, amasoso, okhilimu, njll. Lapho uwagcina esitofini, kulapho amanzi ehwamuka enhlanganisweni ... (kusobala). Inhlanganisela ejiyile izokwenza fafaza ama-bubble aqinile (enza ukungcola ekhishini), ngakho-ke thinta izinga lokushisa lokupheka ngokufanele ngobuningi be-prep, isibindi, inqubo yokubilisa kufanele ibe kancane. Amanzi amancane asho okuningi kugxilwe ama-flavour, hlola njalo imithamo yezinongo, bese uhlela kusengaphambili ukuthi ulindele ukukhipha amanzi angakanani, njengomthetho wesithupha, izinongo zithatha u-1-3% wesisindo esiphelele sezithako eziqinile. Uma sisebenzisa umusi, kusho ukuthi ibhodwe kufanele libe ne- isivalo kuyo (ukungavumeli umphunga uphunyuke), awudingi umpheki wokucindezela, ukupheka ngomphunga, abapheki bokucindezela basheshisa inqubo. Ungakugwema ukubilisa imifino ngokusebenzisa amanzi amancane nje ukukhahlela ukuhwamuka; Imifino eminingi ikhipha ingxenye enhle yokuqukethwe kwamanzi lapho ivezwa amazinga okushisa aphakeme, amanzi akhishwe nawo agcina ehwamuka aqeda inqubo yokupheka imifino (imifinobapheke ngamanzi abo ). Ukupheka izimbobo (ngokwesibonelo namazambane) kusheshisa inqubo yokupheka, njengoba ukushisa kukwazi ukufinyelela ezingxenyeni zangaphakathi ngokushesha. Uma usebenzisa iwayini noma uviniga wezinongo / isobho qaphela ukuthi kokubili utshwala (obuvela ewayinini), kanye ne-acetic acid (evela kuviniga) anobuthi lapho ziphenduka igesi, (zimbi emaphashini akho). Iningi lokuqukethwe kotshwala kuyaphuma ngesikhathi senqubo yokubilisa ( cishe 3/4 ngesigamu sehora). Unganciphisi uviniga kakhulu, njengoba i-acetic acid egxilile ingakwazi konakalisa amapani ensimbi (iTerracotta isingatha kangcono). Ukubilisa iwayini / uviniga kuzonuka kabi nganoma iyiphi indlela, kepha ukunambitheka okungeziwe ku-prep kuzokufanele, (kepha ungapheli ukukwenza). Amanzi nomphunga kunciphisa ukusabela kweMaillard. Ukuphakama kuthinta izinga lokushisa elibilayo ngenxa yengcindezi yasemkhathini, ukuphakama kokuphakama kungaphansi kokushisa okubilayo.

Ukuphumula

Amanye ama-preps kufanele adliwe khona manjalo, njenge ama-souffles abanye bangadinga izikhathi ezimbalwa zokuphumula:

  • Amakhukhi kufanele avunyelwe ukuba aphumule aze afinyelele izinga lokushisa ekamelweni, ukukhipha umhwamuko osalayo. Ungalokothi ubeke amakhukhi asuka kuhhavini ngqo ebhokisini elivaliwe.

  • Amakhekhe esipanji, nokufaka amalungiselelo anzima (njenge tiramisu ) badinga isikhathi sefriji ukumunca izinto zokuhlobisa.

  • Amaphayi adinga isikhathi sokupholisa ukuvumela uqweqwe ukuba luqine; (uma uzama ukusika ucezu ngenkathi insimbi isashisa kuhhavini, izowahlazeka ezandleni zakho)

  • Ama-Ice Creams adinga ifriji ngemuva kwenqubo yokuhlangana, ukubuyisa i-viscosity efanele ngamazinga okushisa aphansi.

  • Amawayini agcinwe eshalofini isikhathi eside angavela (angenabungozi) amakristalu phansi. Iwayini noViniga kukhula izinsalela isikhathi esengeziwe njengoba imvubelo engaphakathi kubo ifa. (Ama-Dregs empeleni enziwe ngama-bacteria afile, kuyadliwa, noma ngabe kubaba).

  • I-Puff pastry isebenzisa imvubelo yemishini kusuka ekuhlukanisweni kwezingqimba ezahlukahlukene zenhlama, futhi idinga ukuphumula ngemuva kokusetshenzwa kwendwangu ngayinye eyengeziwe.

  • Amasaladi adinga ukuphumula esiqandisini, ukuze amunce izinongo, uwoyela neviniga.

  • Okokupheka kwe-pizza, i-focaccia ne-calzone, ukuphumula inhlama (okungenani isigamu sehora) ngemuva kokuyibeka epanini, kuvumela imvubelo eyengeziwe ukwenzeka ngaphambi kokufaka okokufaka.

  • Ama-emulsion kawoyela namanzi awahlali isikhathi eside (ngaphandle kwabasizi abanjengo lecithin ), amasosi okuphumula akhiwe nge-yogurt isikhathi eside kakhulu azonikeza imiphumela engadingeki.

  • Lapho usomisa imifino noma izithelo obala, qaphela izinyoni, kungenjalo sebenzisa umshini wokomisa noma i-ovini ngesikhathi esiphansi.

[2] ukulungiselela, igama elijwayelekile lapho kungekho nhlama ebandakanyekayo ngesikhathi sokupheka.
[1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classification ye iwayini
Thumela impendulo, ukulungiswa neziphakamiso ku: ukupheka ~ e ~ kuya.re

Thumela Amathegi: ukupheka, Imihlahlandlela
Julayi 25, 2021

Uma ulinganisa izinto, imvamisa kuba khona ijika, elikutshela ukuthi udinga malini. Ngokuvamile lokhu kungakhiwa ngendlela yokuthi ungabeka iphuzu elikahle lokuncamela.

Yonke into ekulesi database kufanele ibe nayo:

  • incazelo yex futhiy izimbazo

  • a ubuncane futhi esiphezulu ngezembe ngalinye

  • umsebenzi wokuhlela ijika (kungaba ngezibalo noma selivele lisetshenzisiwe ku-prog. lang.)
